title.rendered: The Difference Between Organic and Paid Search

content.rendered:
Do you sell products/services online? If so, you should have a strong grasp on the difference between organic and paid search.
As an online business, your primary goal is to reach a wide audience and maximize conversions. Both organic and paid search help you do just that! They boost your online visibility, improve your SERP rankings, and help you generate more traffic. Sounds like the perfect mix?
In this infographic, we dive deeper and walk you through the differences between organic and paid search. We cover their position, cost, ranking, and speed. We also discuss some genius tips to improve both organic and paid search campaigns. Let’s get right into it!

excerpt.rendered: Do you sell products/services online? If so, you should have a strong grasp on the difference between organic and paid search.
